notifications.temperatureHigh: Your greenhouse is getting too hot ({{temp}}). The system will try to cool it down automatically.
notifications.temperatureLow: Your greenhouse is getting too cold ({{temp}}). The system will try to warm it up automatically.
notifications.temperatureNormal: Temperature is {{temp}}. Keep an eye on your plants.
notifications.temperatureAttention: Temperature needs attention in your greenhouse.
notifications.humidityHigh: Air is too humid ({{humidity}}). The system will try to reduce moisture automatically.
notifications.humidityLow: Air is too dry ({{humidity}}). The system will try to add moisture automatically.
notifications.humidityNormal: Humidity is {{humidity}}. Your plants should be comfortable.
notifications.humidityAttention: Humidity levels need attention in your greenhouse.
notifications.deviceOnline: Your device is back online and working normally.
notifications.actionUpdate: Update about an action on your farm.
notifications.somethingHappened: Something happened on your farm that you should know about.
notifications.markFilteredAsReadError: Error marking filtered notifications as read
notifications.mapViewDescription: Interactive map with notification pins will be available in the next update.

suggestedActions.checkDevicePower: Check device power and WiFi connection. Try restarting the device.
suggestedActions.retryAction: Try the action again in a few minutes. Check if the device is responding.

manualControl.title: Device Control Center
manualControl.subtitle: Execute manual actions on your smart farm devices
manualControl.automationOnSubtext: Your farm is running automatically. Devices will respond to sensor data.
manualControl.automationOffSubtext: Automation is disabled. You can control devices manually.
manualControl.automationActiveDescription: Your farm is running automatically. The system will monitor sensors and control devices based on your settings.
manualControl.actionPanelDescription: Control your devices directly when automation is disabled.
manualControl.noDevicesDescription: No devices are currently available for manual control.
manualControl.automationOffConfirmation: Are you sure you want to disable automation? This will stop all automatic device control.
manualControl.safeModeActive: Safe Mode is active. Device control is restricted.
manualControl.automationActiveError: Automation is currently active. Manual control is disabled for safety.
manualControl.safeModeActiveError: Safe Mode is active. Manual control is disabled.

manualControl.consoleDescription: Control your farm devices manually when automation is disabled
manualControl.actionConfirmation: Are you sure you want to {{action}} {{device}}?
